lead_paragraph: A MOVING MOUNTAIN.--The Genoa correspondent of The Newark Daily Advertiser narrates the following incident: I notice, as apropos to this report of subterranean disorder, an account from Hungary of the actual movement of a mountain;--a feat which the Mahemetan Prophet tried to accomplish in vain.
